channel.title: Image Enhancement on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Image Enhancement on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: MambaLLIE: Implicit Retinex-Aware Low Light Enhancement with Global-then-Local State Space
item.description: MambaLLIE: a novel implicit Retinex-aware low-light enhancer using a global-then-local state space, significantly outperforms existing CNN and Transformer-based methods.

item.title: Quality-Improved and Property-Preserved Polarimetric Imaging via Complementarily Fusing
item.description: This paper introduces a novel three-phase neural network framework that significantly enhances the quality of polarimetric images by complementarily fusing degraded noisy and blurry snapshots, preserv…
